definition: to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

pinyin: tuo1 yang3 he2 tang2 he2 suan1

sentences.english: Enzyme that polymerizes deoxyribonucleotides to make DNA.
sentences.chinese: 将脱氧核糖核苷酸聚合形成DNA的酶。

sentences.english: DNA is composed of a backbone made from deoxyribose and phosphate.
sentences.chinese: DNA是由脱氧核糖组成了脊梁和磷酸盐。

definition: pentose (CH2O)5, monosaccharide with five carbon atoms, such as ribose 核糖[he2 tang2]
peptide bond CO-NH/bond in protein between carboxyl radical and amino radical
adenine nucleotide (A, pairs with thymine T 胸腺嘧啶 in DNA and with uracil U 尿嘧啶 in RNA)
thymine nucleotide (T, pairs with adenine A 腺嘌呤 in DNA)
pentose (CH2O)5, monosaccharide with five carbon atoms, such as ribose 核糖[he2 tang2]
peptide chain (chain of amino acids making up protein)
uracil nucleotide (U, pairs with adenine A 腺嘌呤 in RNA)
cytosine nucleotide (C, pairs with guanine G 鳥嘌呤|鸟嘌呤 in DNA and RNA)
guanine nucleotide (G, pairs with cytosine C 胞嘧啶 in DNA and RNA)
peptidoglycan (PG) or murein (polymer of sugars and amino acids forming cell wall)
